formula: a(n+1)=a(n)*10^floor[1+log10(n!)]+n!, with a(0)=1 - _Paolo P. Lava_, Jul 04 2008
maple: P:=proc(i) local a,n; a:=1; print(1); for n from 1 by 1 to i do a:=a*10^floor(evalf(1+log10(n!),1000))+n!; print(a); od; end: P(50); - _Paolo P. Lava_, Jul 04 2008
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Aug 07 2000
